proposals.description: Implement cross-agent learning feedback loops where each agent maintains a memory of successful patterns and shares insights with other agents. This would create a collective intelligence that learns from each evolution cycle, improving proposal quality, implementation efficiency, and test coverage over time.
proposals.implementation_sketch: Add a shared knowledge base that agents can read from and contribute to. Each agent records successful patterns, common failure modes, and optimization insights. Include a simple scoring system for pattern effectiveness and automatic pattern sharing during agent initialization.
